segments.text: I heard you are busy with your new house now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I want my own house very much , so I decide to buy one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let meet this right — — do you want to buy the house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . This is a big house with a garden . I like it very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But it is far from downtown . Living here is very inconvenient .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is very quiet and peaceful . This is what I want .
segments.speaker: S2
